name: UIInteraction
desc: The protocol that an interaction implements to access the view that owns it.

items.name: var view: UIView?
items.desc: The view that owns the interaction.

items.name: func didMove(to: UIView?)
items.desc: Tells the interaction that a view added or removed it from the view's interactions array.

items.name: func willMove(to: UIView?)
items.desc: Tells the interaction that a view will add or remove it from the view's interactions array.
